channel.title: Project 12 - Development/Recruiting
channel.description:
Hello, I am looking for members to join the Project 12 development team. I am looking for [u][b]EXPERIENCED/ADVANCED[/b][/u] java programmers. We will be working on a client, a server, and our own updated cache (items, npcs, emotes, the works). This will be challanging task! Please make a commitment to this. Don't quit half way through. Also, please do not spam/flame this thread.
Positions: Server Programmer - Current Amount of members - 1 Client Programmer - Current Amount of members - 3 Server Tester - Amount of members - FULL Graphics artists - Amount of members - 2
Note, if you want to a programming position you will need at least a medium knowledge of java. Client programmers will need to know basics of cache editing (I will link you to some tutorials if you need). Graphics artists will be responsible for the game frame, sprites, ect. for the client.
Application: (code tags are not needed) [code] [i]Position Wanted:[/i]position here [i]Experience In position:[/i] experience here [i]MSN adress*:[/i]msn adress here.[/code]
[i]*This will be our main way of contacting each other. We will use the PM system, but msn is our main. You can also PM me your MSN if you want.[/i]
You can contact me on msn at ratwacker@hotmail.com
We will also post "small" updates here. Major ones will be kept away from the public.

item.title: Project 12 - Development/Recruiting
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

Hello, I am looking for members to join the Project 12 development team. I am looking for EXPERIENCED/ADVANCED java programmers. We will be working on a client, a server, and our own updated cache (items, npcs, emotes, the works). This will be challanging task! Please make a commitment to this. Don’t quit half way through. Also, please do not spam/flame this thread.

Positions:
Server Programmer - Current Amount of members - 1
Client Programmer - Current Amount of members - 3
Server Tester - Amount of members - FULL
Graphics artists - Amount of members - 2

Note, if you want to a programming position you will need at least a medium knowledge of java. Client programmers will need to know basics of cache editing (I will link you to some tutorials if you need). Graphics artists will be responsible for the game frame, sprites, ect. for the client.

Application: (code tags are not needed)

[i]Position Wanted:[/i]position here [i]Experience In position:[/i] experience here [i]MSN adress*:[/i]msn adress here.

*This will be our main way of contacting each other. We will use the PM system, but msn is our main. You can also PM me your MSN if you want.

You can contact me on msn at ratwacker@hotmail.com

We will also post “small” updates here. Major ones will be kept away from the public.

Read full topic
